notes.purpose: Authoritative, machine-readable input schemas for every MCP tool/action exposed by this server, to eliminate schema guessing.

field_meanings.name: Tool name as invoked via MCP.
field_meanings.description: UI-friendly tool description (may include required/optional arg lists).
field_meanings.input_schema: Best-effort JSON Schema for tool arguments (object-shaped; permissive additionalProperties=true).
field_meanings.write_action: Whether the tool is considered write-capable by the controller.
field_meanings.auto_approved: Whether the tool call is auto-approved by the controller runtime.
field_meanings.read_only_hint: UI hint: true when callers should treat it as non-mutating.
